citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 on Oct 23,
2024. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and the licensee indicated no adult was available. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 on Oct 23, 
2024. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone and the licensee indicated no adult was available. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
